name: SoarForecast
0:
”Alexa, ask Soar Forecast should I fly today.”
”Alexa, ask Soar Forecast to tell me my forecast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soar forecast
des:
Quickly find out whether it is worth going out to fly today. Ask Alexa for the soaring forecast for your area, or any area in the US.

Note that you will need to give this skill permission to see your device postal code in the Alexa app for it to know where you are.
